title: Papua and New Guinea development
creator_credit: Douglas White, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the immense potential and the industrial expansion of Papua New Guinea. Full economic development of the territory is an exercise in cooperation between the people themselves, the Administration and private investors.
